episode: When my grandad died it was very sad even though we knew it was coming.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: When my grandad died it was very sad even though we knew it was coming.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Losing a loved one is never easy, even when expected.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: He had dementia which was very sad to see.  He had good days when he knew what was going on and would say that he wanted to die as he didn't like what was happening to him.  It was very sad to hear from a loved one.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That must have been heartbreaking to hear him express that.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It was some good element though that he was now where he wanted to be.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: At least he's at peace now, that's some comfort.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Exactly.  It was awful to see what it was doing to him but there was still an element of my grandad in there on his good days.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's like his spirit was still shining through.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: He lived to a ripe old age

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's something to be grateful for, a long and full life.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: In his 90's.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: He had a good long run, bless him.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: My grandma took a turn for the worse after he died and got full dementia with no good days.  She didn't even realise my grandad had died.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's so sad, a double loss for you and your family.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: When she died, it was comfort that she wasn't suffering anymore.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: At least she's finally at peace, no more pain.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: And with my grandad.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Reunited now, that's a nice thought.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Both are burried in the same place.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Together in rest, that's comforting.
